item.description:
## Release Notes * Shorten folder structure of exported mod collections * Expose config option to disable update logic * Improve a bit import from clipboard * Fix conflict solver resolving wrong filename while exporting single file merge conflict type
## Changes From v1.19 * Update dependencies * Upgrade to net6.0 * Make Irony compliant with new Paradox Launcher 2021.10 formats
